div.span: When the user closes her text editor...
If this command was already run earlier today...
Process last N days of tickler Todos.
Process all Todos in your inbox (i.e. all Todos tagged with the @inbox context).
Move any "done" Todos in the daily file to permenant storage.
Collect Todos to add to daily file.
If Todos are left in daily file from last run...
Collect any todos left over in daily file from last run.
Prompt for Todos (using fuzzy matching) to add to daily file.
Open daily file in text editor.
Ask for verification / more information about Todo changes that we are unsure of.
Render the daily file after adding our newly collected Todos to it.
